1.title: Whispers in the Dust
text: The wind moaned through broken windows, carrying the scent of rust and old memories.
A faint whisper echoes from the saloon. Did someone just call your name?

2a.title: The Saloon Secret
text: You push open the creaky door and step inside. Dust dances in slants of dying sunlight.
A single piano key is pressed down... but no one's there.

2b.title: Forgotten Records
text: Stacks of yellowing documents crumble under your touch.
One file marked 'Evacuation Order - Urgent' sends a chill through your bones.

2c.title: Escape
text: You turn back the way you came, but the road has vanished.
Only the wind answers your call.

ending.text: Some doors shouldn't be opened. And some towns... never left.
